name: SACRIFIGHTS
description:
You’ve uncovered an ancient RITUAL. It’s said to grant immeasurable magic power to those that complete it. All it requires is a little down-payment - your LIFEFORCE.

Summon a series of nightmarish monsters to battle with in this horror action game. Will you gather enough ARCANE POWER in 7 days to repay your debt? Or will you PERISH during your SACRIFIGHTS?

Use arrow keys to move, and X/C to interact.

Coding: Francis Coulombe Art/voices: LumpyTouch Music: cboyardee

We added an embedded web version of the game.  It seems to work best in Chrome. It may be slow or have no sound in some other browsers depending on your setup. If that is the case, the Windows downloadable version available below should work better.
